name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
schedule:
Discussions in Global Issues
I.	Objectives:  The goal of this course is
(1) to familiarize the students with the on-goings of important issues common to most countries and people living on the Planet Earth and (2) to facilitate their awareness of the situations they themselves are currently situated, especially in the ever developing flux of environmental, technological and cultural/social challenges.
II. Time distribution in the class:
1.In the first period of class
a. Weekly test
b. Group presentation on a specific topic
2.In the second period of class: understanding and discussions on weekly reading material
